_description: Love lyrics begging, Lady have ruth on me — four l0-line stanzas (aabaabbaab)

BLHar2253.First Lines: Wiþ longyng y am ladOn molde y waxe mad…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…Heuene y tolde al hisÞat o nyht were hire
                    gest
